archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.5: Details about standard configurations should be recorded in a suitable format (e.g. a configuration management database (CMDB) or a configuration management system (CMS)), which should contain:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
